parameters.name: X-API-TOKEN
parameters.description: The API token to be used for authentication

parameters.name: X-Requested-With
parameters.description: Used to send the XMLHttpRequest header

parameters.name: index
parameters.description:
Replaces the default response index from data to a user specific string

ie.

```html
  ?index=new_index
```

response is wrapped

```json
  {
    'new_index' : [
      .....  
    ]
  }
```

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of records to return for each request, default is 20

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to return for this request (when performing pagination), default is 1

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Returns the list sorted by column in ascending or descending order.

```html
  ?sort=name|desc
```
